attributes.action: Raise the personal tax allowance to £15,000
attributes.additional_details: The Government has frozen our personal tax allowance, and due to inflation we feel that we are watching more of our hard-earned cash vanish.
attributes.background: We think the Government should put up the personal tax allowance to £15,000. This could help people on a low wage and help with the increase in the cost of living.
